item.title: MIUI OS1.0.3.0.UMFRUXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13T Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Russia

Codename: aristotle

Version: OS1.0.3.0.UMFRUXM | 14.0

Size: 7.7 GB

MD5: af5eecc0a07f827384e6e386a780c130

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.

Download: Here
